name: Fire Fades
description:
Description

Fire Fades is a 3D flying platformer. Take a journey with your ember to the holy mountain in an flying adventure. Will you succeed or will you let the fire fade?

Controls

Mouse = Move Camera WASD = Movement SPACE = Jump (Hold to glide) Left Mouse Button = Hook (on a wall) Right Mouse Button = Fire Speed Boost

Technology Used

Unity; Photoshop; Amplify Shader Editor; Audacity;
